data.text: Jacob gaa mmada gi Esau e hanimoi mo ana daane e haa lau, gei mee gaa duhe nia dama lligi i Leah, Rachel mo nia lodo hege dogolua.
Mee gaa hai nia lodo hege mo nau dama gii hula i mua, nomuli go Leah mo ana dama, muliagina go Rachel mo Joseph.
Jacob gaa hana i mua digaula, ga bala gi lala gi hongo di gelegele hagahidu i dono hanimoi gi dono duaahina.
Gei Esau gaa lele e heetugi gi mee, ga bulubulu gaa hongi a mee. Meemaa huogodoo gu tangitangi.
Esau ga madamada ga gidee nia ahina mo nia dama ga heeu, “Ma nia daangada koai aanei ala e madalia goe?”
Gei nia lodo hege ga loomoi mo nau dama gaa pala gi lala.
Nomuli, gei Leah mo ana dama ga loomoi, hagamuliagina loo Joseph mo Rachel ga loomoi gaa pala gi lala.
Esau ga heeu, “Gei di buini dela ne heetugi ginai au? Dono hadinga bolo aha?”
Esau ga helekai, “Dogu duaahina, au guu dohu mai gi di au. Benabena ina nia mee ala i do baahi.”

Jacob ga helekai, “Deeai, dumaalia, maa goe gu dumaalia mai, gumidia dagu wanga dehuia. Dogu mmada gi o hadumada, au e hai be tangada ne mmada gi nia hadumada a God, gei dolomeenei goe gu humalia mai gi di au.

Dumaalia gumidia di wanga dehuia dela ne gaamai ko au gi di goe. God gu humalia mai gu gaamai nia mee huogodoo ala hagalee i dogu baahi.” Jacob e haihai gi mee bolo gi kaina dana wanga dehuia, gaa dae gi mee gaa kumi di maa.
Esau ga helekai, “Hagatogomaalia gaa hula. Au e hana i oo mua.”

Jacob ga helekai, “Goe e iloo bolo nia dama le e paagege, gei au e hai gi madamada humalia nia siibi, mo nia kau mo nadau dama. Maa digaula gaa dagi ga duadua i lodo di laangi e dahi, digaula huogodoo gaa mmade.
Dumaalia hana i ogu mua, gei au ga daudali adu maalia i oo muli mo agu manu mo nia dama gii dae adu loo gi di goe i Edom.”
Esau ga helekai, “Dumaalia mai gii dugu hunu daane i agu daane i do baahi.”
Malaa, di laangi deelaa Esau ga hagatanga gaa hana gi Edom.

Gei Jacob gaa hana gi Sukkoth, gaa hau dono hale mo nia damaa hale ang gi ana manu. Deelaa di mee ne haga ingoo di gowaa deelaa bolo Sukkoth.33.17 Sukkoth: Di ingoo deenei dono hadinga i nnelekai Hebrew boloo, “nia damaa hale”.
Dono hanimoi gi muli mai Mesopotamia, Jacob guu dau humalia i di waahale Shechem i tenua go Canaan, ga hagaduu aga ono hale laa hoohoo gi di waahale.
Mee guu hui di gowaa deelaa mai nia hagadili o Hamor, tamana o Shechem, gi nia bahihadu silber e lau.33.19 Joshua 24.32; John 4.5
Gei mee gaa hau dana gowaa hai tigidaumaha i golo, ga haga ingoo di maa bolo El Elohe Israel, (dono hadinga bolo “El, di God o Israel”).
